vendors.name: Smartleaf
vendors.note: Pricing & Features complete. Enterprise AUM-based pricing (firm-wide minimum or basis-point fees). Core features: Daily automated rebalancing, tax optimization (avg 3.2% savings), direct indexing. Advanced: Menu-driven customization, Model Distribution Service, advanced householding, cash management. Enterprise: Role-based workflows, IPC controls, advisor portal. GitHub: https://github.com/ActiveEX/vendor-spec/blob/main/vendors/smartleaf.md. Next: Product Overview phase.

vendors.name: Skience
vendors.note: INTEGRATIONS COMPLETE (10:56 AM EST). 14 integrations exhaustively documented: 4 Clearing & Custody (Fidelity, Pershing, Schwab, TD Ameritrade), 2 Managed Account Platforms (Envestnet, Morningstar), 1 Financial Planning (MoneyGuidePro), 7 Technology Tools (Salesforce, Redtail, DocuSign, EVS, Quik!, RightBRIDGE, Laser App). Additional note: 200+ data consolidation sources mentioned (not individually listed). GitHub: https://github.com/ActiveEX/vendor-spec/blob/main/vendors/skience.md. Commit: 99ad01e. Trello: https://trello.com/c/698d9ffdf42d93b3ab467521. Next: Final Validation.
